g.text: Marketing intelligence that asks the right questions — not just reports what happened
Most analytics dashboards show surface-level metrics. Growlytics performs
probabilistic analysis, conditional probability, and correlation mapping that standard tools miss.
What to do next — not just what happened
"Users who complete onboarding AND interact with feature_X within first session have
P(purchase) = 0.47 vs baseline 0.18. Estimated revenue uplift: +23.4%"
to build next and how to optimize
